sentences.en: Pardon me while I laugh hysterically at this thought.
sentences.cn: 请原谅我因为这个想法而歇斯底里地大笑。

sentences.en: Even the pirates were awed, and Tootles cried out hysterically, "I am going to do what my mother hopes."
sentences.cn: 连海盗们心生敬畏，图托斯歇斯底里地叫道：“我要去做我母亲希望我做的事。”

sentences.en: As the last notes of the hymn died away, the widow ran to the coffin, cast herself upon it and sobbed hysterically.
sentences.cn: 当赞美诗的最后几个音符渐渐消失时，寡妇跑到棺材前，扑在上面，歇斯底里地抽泣起来。
